name: Minestorm (Sasha Legrand)
description:
Hello dear gamers!

I present you my remake of the famous arcade game Minestorm made in 1982. It was a school project where the goal was to use our 2D collision detection algorithms to recreate the Minestorm game.

You are a little ship and you are trying to survive multiple waves of enemies. Try to reach the 18 wave and kill all your opponents. But be careful, the MotherShip is looking for you.

Have fun! :D
